step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job finding a comfortable position. Keep focusing on that whole-body muscle tightening as you inhale.
Excellent! You're maintaining a good posture. Remember to relax your muscles completely as you exhale.
Your breathing is deep and controlled. Continue to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you inhale and tighten your muscles.
Fantastic! You're effectively relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out as you exhale. Keep up the great work.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to tighten your whole body as you inhale and relax completely as you exhale. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
